credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Frame for a papal inscription
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Vertical rectangle. The oval tablet is framed by crossed stems springing from the mouth of a mask below. Above are the crossed keys and the tiara. Slight sketching in the tablet. Usual background.
name: Drawing
